titleStmt.title: A proclamation requiring all heretors and free-holders, and militia of the Kingdom of Scotland to be in a readiness to come out in their best arms and provided (upon advertisement) for His Majesties service
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ... ;

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and Bodleian Library.
At end of text:" Given under our signet at Edinburgh, the eleventh day of May, 1685."
Item at reel 962:9 identified as Wing J368C (number cancelled).
